thread.title: You have a feeling of home
thread.title_full: You have a feeling of home - Review of Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jan K
title: You have a feeling of home
text:
This hotel is really amazing. Luxury and nice decorate. The room is small but comfort and luxury style and great bed, but TOP is a service on this hotel. Warming friendly and professional staff here. We really enjoyed a stay here, thank you for that.
Room Tip: Petit room See more room tips
